outputs.output_descr: Progressive realization and implementation of the standards of human rights and institutionalization of reforms for democratic governance.  This "rights-reforms" approach is grounded locally where interventions are directed not only at the national level but also, more importantly, demonstrated at the level of LGUs and grassroots communities.

Progressive realization and implementation of the standards of human rights and institutionalization of reforms for democratic governance.  This "rights-reforms" approach is grounded locally where interventions are directed not only at the national level but also, more importantly, demonstrated at the level of LGUs and grassroots communities.

project_descr: Democratic Governance: Strengthening the Human Rights Infrastructure in the Philippines
